subject: New file uploaded to EVP-ITC
author: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
full_text:
Hello,

This email message is a notification to let you know that
a file has been uploaded to the Files area of the EVP-ITC 
group.

  File        : /Fasty's file/maple hill nov.4 normal speed.wav 
  Uploaded by : necromodeus <necromodeus@...> 
  Description : My name is Timm.This e.v.p. that I captured Nov.4th at a cemetery  in Charlotte,Mi seems to say,"Timm...get out now." 

You can access this file at the URL:
http://groups.yahoo.com/group/EVP-ITC/files/Fasty%27s%20file/maple%20hill%20nov.4%20normal%20speed.wav 

To learn more about file sharing for your group, please visit:
http://help.yahoo.com/l/us/yahoo/groups/original/members/web/index.htmlfiles

Regards,

necromodeus <necromodeus@...>
